channel.title: Climate issues on Erwin Kuhn
channel.description: Recent content in Climate issues on Erwin Kuhn

item.title: There's no plan B for concrete
item.description: Introduction I’ve been working for the past year with Vicat, (sidenote: For the anecdote, Louis Vicat is the inventor of one of the first modern cement formulations in 1817! He also released his discovery to the world without any patent, which enabled tremendous improvements in construction efficiency at the time. ) a large French cement group, on their climate strategy. More specifically, we are developing N-Zero, a modelling tool to create roadmaps towards carbon neutral cement.
